mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim is Our Command! Join today to experience the luxury of limitless indulgence! 

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into the Bank of Entitlement, the air tingling with sheer majesty. I march up to the teller-"Ugh, excuse me, I NEED my latte delivered to my office ASAP!" Well, you should've seen the face on that poor teller. They tried to explain that they don't serve coffee, can you believe that? I was FUMING. Who wouldn't serve a VIP like me, right? But then, I remembered-my magnificence. I demanded to speak to the manager, and within minutes, there I was, sipping my freshly brewed latte while all the staff gazed at me in awe. See? Sometimes you just have to remind them who they're dealing with!
